item.description: Definition 1 Flow Given a space $X$ and a function $f : X \to X$, suppose we have the following vector field presented as a differential equation. $$ \dot{x} = f(x) $$ For a time variable $t$ and an initial value $x_{0}$, the solution to the autonomous differential equation is called a flow, which is denoted as $F(t, x_{0})$.
